text: Tihomir Kostadinov (; born 4 March 1996 in Skopje) is a Macedonian midfielder who currently plays for Fortuna Liga club Ružomberok. ==Club career== ===Moravac=== Born in North Macedonia's capital of Skopje, Kostadinov made his professional debut by playing in neighboring Serbia, with Moravac Mrštane in the 2014–15 Serbian First League, Serbian second level. ===FC ViOn Zlaté Moravce - Vráble=== Kostadinov made his Fortuna Liga debut for ViOn Zlaté Moravce in a 1:2 loss against Spartak Myjava on 16 July 2016. He debuted directly in the starting XI. FC ViOn Zlaté Moravce - Vráble - Spartak Myjava 1:2 (0:1) 16.07.2016, futbalnet.sk ==International career== He made his senior debut for North Macedonia in a November 2019 European Championship qualification match against Austria. ==References== ==External links== * * Fortuna Liga profile * * Eurofotbal profile Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Valandovo Category:Association football midfielders Category:Macedonian footballers Category:North Macedonia youth international footballers Category:North Macedonia under-21 international footballers Category:North Macedonia international footballers Category:FK Moravac Mrštane players Category:FK Teteks players Category:FK Dukla Banská Bystrica players Category:FC ViOn Zlaté Moravce players Category:MFK Ružomberok players Category:Serbian First League players Category:Macedonian First Football League players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:Macedonian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Serbia Category:Macedonian expatriate sportspeople in Serbia Category:Expatriate footballers in Slovakia Category:Macedonian expatriate sportspeople in Slovakia
title: Tihomir Kostadinov
